title: Smother
description: You won't like me.I am not the nice girl.I am not your friend.I don't care about you, but most of all, I don't care about me.Go ahead, hate me.We all have secrets.I have them as wellâ€”dark, terrible secrets.The only time I can breathe is when I forget.I need to be numb.You don't want to know how.But as long as I can breathe, the past cannot smother me.
author: Lindy Zart
